text: [Music]
but we get into very murky territory
here because it's all a matter of taste
I mean I have the writers that I care
about most the writers that I think are
the greatest writers of the past and of
the present but my list would be very
different perhaps from yours and um but
I guess the the important thing for
Young Writers is to read read the read
the good ones and I suppose uh by that I
mean um the ones whove with stood the
test of time uh the you know the great
ones Hawthorne Melville uh dfki Tolstoy
koffka Dickens um uh that's where you're
going to get the most I think and um
when when you see how you know
brilliantly they they they do things uh
flow bear uh
you know all the names that we know but
they're there for a reason because they
really are the best writers and I think
you have to learn from the great
ones and what from
what common trap
um I suppose a um a kind of um egotism
self-importance
um um inability to look out of
themselves
um and I think um it's it's important to
um look very closely at the world
everything happening around you and
sometimes for young people it's
difficult to do that um and and the
other thing is to
um to get too attached to uh some of the
uh things that you think are clever that
you're doing I think um cleverness has
its spots it's place in the world
perhaps
but the the burning need to do it is
what makes for good work um the the the
wish to do it doesn't really help you
it's when it's absolutely necessary so
when I talk to Young Writers I mostly
tell them don't do it don't be a writer
it's a terrible way to live your life um
there's nothing to be gained from it but
poverty and obscurity and um and
Solitude so if you a taste for all those
things which means that you really are
burning to do it then go ahead and do it
but don't expect anything from anybody
because the world doesn't owe you
anything and no one is asking you to do
it and I suppose it's this feeling of
accomplishment that young people feel
sometimes they say well of course my
book should be published of course I
should be able to earn a living out of
this well it just doesn't work that way
